title: Pre-arrest veigar skin
body:
UPDATE::
New teemo skin coming out! Some sort of evil or war veteran skin heres a link http://skins.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/omegasquad/
anywayyyy
this strengthens my idea :D
We've got (finally!) an evil teemo skin!
So we need the "good" veigar skin
>:D
{{champion:45}} 
Just an idea-- 
We've got prevoid kassadin and malzahar as well as some other champion skins that show a different possible timeline for them.
Lets have a skin of what veigar looked like before he was imprisoned by noxus!
Not only would this be cool, but we could finally get a glimpse of whats under that big hat ;).. because right now for all we know hes just a floating black orb with glowing eyes in a suit.
He should probably be wearing some sort of merchant attire, and his spells could be light-colored (good) instead of the usual dark colored look.
The splash art would probably show him in prison or something.
What do you think?

replies.body: How much would the skin be worth? It seems you need a voice change and new partical effects. Maybe as much as the battle cast skins?

Always*

All ways could be grammatically appropriate if it was led with an "in".

For an example, "In all ways Greybeard Veigar is the best skin."
Likely about that, although I don't really know much about the way Riot prices skins
As a {{champion:45}} main AND a fan-skin splash artist, this REALLY strikes me fancy! It's just the matter of figuring out more on what he'd look like.
It would be a really interesting turn for this character! The vile Veigar, ALL CUTE AN' FLUFFY BECAUSE HE'S A YORDLE!! Lol.
As a {{champion:45}} main, I really like the idea.
If the concept is **pre**-arrest, why would the splash art have him in prison?

It would be right after he was arrested, before he became insane and changed... I felt that a noxian prison would be the best setting as it would be easier recognized as specifically veigar's past rather than bandle city or something else more general. Although I suppose pre-arrest still isnt literally correct xD

You're fooling yourself if they think they would create a skin based solely on a champion's lore. It just doesnt work. 
Yes I know pre-void kass is a thing but how often do you see that played?
